title: OUC 2016 Semester 1 results
body:
The OUC grand finals were played this Sunday. We hope you tuned in to some of the games.

We had Griffith University vs Monash University in a best of 3 series with Monash coming out on top 2-0

https://www.flickr.com/photos/132521248@N06/26514271030/in/album-72157667705064241/
https://www.flickr.com/photos/132521248@N06/26181365974/in/album-72157667705064241/

and Queensland University of Technology vs University of Technology, Sydney in a best of 5 series. This turned out to be an epic 5 game series, with UTS pulling the clutch game 5 win.

https://www.flickr.com/photos/132521248@N06/26786745775/in/album-72157667705064241/
https://www.flickr.com/photos/132521248@N06/26786709625/in/album-72157667705064241/

You can check out the [VODs here](https://youtu.be/iStkbBrszfM) and full [album here](https://www.flickr.com/photos/132521248@N06/albums/72157667705064241/page1/)

Congrats to Team UTS for being crowned the best Uni team in Oceania.

Huge shout out to all the University clubs involved and see you next time!
